channel.title: [PI] 317 Solitude Source Random DCs
channel.description:
Hey, I'm having an issue with my server. When players switch items, or sometimes when they just do something like clicking a steel titan, they will get disconnected. These aren't just normal disconnections, though. Sometimes the players will get [url=http://i464.photobucket.com/albums/rr9/ownerthugz/weirdclawdc.png]Random PMs/Server Update Message[/url], sometimes [url=http://i464.photobucket.com/albums/rr9/ownerthugz/wtfdc.png]all other players disappear/odd clan chat message[/url], and sometimes random interfaces will open up like [url=http://i46.tinypic.com/ebajgw.png]thessilas clothes shop[/url]. Other times, the client will just freeze. The picture could[url=http://i.imgur.com/Ms6tv.jpg] just zoom out[/url], and there are many other instances as well.
Do any of you know what could be causing this? Is it client sided?
I get this error when I log in: [code] Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T2 - 126,126,71 - 20,0,0 - 84,111,116,97,108,32,76,101,118,101,108,58,32, 50,51,55,54,10,121,95, Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 7,0,0 - 50,51,55,54,10,121,96, Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 24,0,0 - 84,111,116,97,108,32,88,80,58,32,45,49,51,54, 53,56,54,53,55,57,50,10,121,94,[/code]
And I get this error when I switch a bunch of items really fast. [code] Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos:2 psize:0 Error: T2 - 81,126,246 - 0,3088,3489 - Error: T1 - 123,0 - 126,126 Error: T2 - 134,248,123 - 6,3088,3489 - -56,0,-1,-1,6,26, Error: T1 - 48,0 - 134,248 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method119(client.java:11248) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9986) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10915) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6144) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
OK, now another error when I switched really fast. [code] Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos:2 psize:0 Error: T2 - 81,126,246 - 0,3088,3489 - Error: T1 - 132,0 - 126,126 Error: T1 - 58,0 - 132,126 Error: T1 - 161,0 - 58,132 Error: T1 - 225,0 - 161,58 Error: T1 - 143,0 - 225,161 Error: T1 - 173,0 - 143,225 Error: T1 - 162,0 - 173,143 Error: T2 - 87,162,173 - 6,3088,3489 - 0,-1,-1,62,-8,11, Error: T1 - 7,0 - 87,162 Error: T1 - 89,0 - 7,87 Error: T1 - 169,0 - 89,7 Error: T2 - 101,169,89 - 2,3088,3489 - 126,54, Error: T1 - 236,0 - 101,169 Error: T1 - 234,0 - 236,101 Error: T2 - 71,234,236 - 3,3088,3489 - 0,54,40, Error: T1 - 251,0 - 176,185 Error: T1 - 226,0 - 251,176 Error: T1 - 111,0 - 226,251 Error: T1 - 207,0 - 111,226 Error: T1 - 157,0 - 207,111 Error: T1 - 198,0 - 157,207 Error: T1 - 118,0 - 176,122 Error: T1 - 135,0 - 118,176[/code]
^^Those errors are from the client.

item.title: [PI] 317 Solitude Source Random DCs
item.dc:creator: @InitialBN InitialBN
item.description:
@InitialBN wrote:

Hey, I’m having an issue with my server. When players switch items, or sometimes when they just do something like clicking a steel titan, they will get disconnected. These aren’t just normal disconnections, though. Sometimes the players will get Random PMs/Server Update Message, sometimes all other players disappear/odd clan chat message, and sometimes random interfaces will open up like thessilas clothes shop. Other times, the client will just freeze. The picture could just zoom out, and there are many other instances as well.

Do any of you know what could be causing this? Is it client sided?

I get this error when I log in:

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Error: T2 - 126,126,71 - 20,0,0 - 84,111,116,97,108,32,76,101,118,101,108,58,32, 50,51,55,54,10,121,95, Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 7,0,0 - 50,51,55,54,10,121,96, Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 24,0,0 - 84,111,116,97,108,32,88,80,58,32,45,49,51,54, 53,56,54,53,55,57,50,10,121,94,

And I get this error when I switch a bunch of items really fast.

Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos:2 psize:0 Error: T2 - 81,126,246 - 0,3088,3489 - Error: T1 - 123,0 - 126,126 Error: T2 - 134,248,123 - 6,3088,3489 - -56,0,-1,-1,6,26, Error: T1 - 48,0 - 134,248 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method119(client.java:11248) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9986) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10915) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6144) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

OK, now another error when I switched really fast.

Error: Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos:2 psize:0 Error: T2 - 81,126,246 - 0,3088,3489 - Error: T1 - 132,0 - 126,126 Error: T1 - 58,0 - 132,126 Error: T1 - 161,0 - 58,132 Error: T1 - 225,0 - 161,58 Error: T1 - 143,0 - 225,161 Error: T1 - 173,0 - 143,225 Error: T1 - 162,0 - 173,143 Error: T2 - 87,162,173 - 6,3088,3489 - 0,-1,-1,62,-8,11, Error: T1 - 7,0 - 87,162 Error: T1 - 89,0 - 7,87 Error: T1 - 169,0 - 89,7 Error: T2 - 101,169,89 - 2,3088,3489 - 126,54, Error: T1 - 236,0 - 101,169 Error: T1 - 234,0 - 236,101 Error: T2 - 71,234,236 - 3,3088,3489 - 0,54,40, Error: T1 - 251,0 - 176,185 Error: T1 - 226,0 - 251,176 Error: T1 - 111,0 - 226,251 Error: T1 - 207,0 - 111,226 Error: T1 - 157,0 - 207,111 Error: T1 - 198,0 - 157,207 Error: T1 - 118,0 - 176,122 Error: T1 - 135,0 - 118,176

^^Those errors are from the client.

Read full topic
